Rancher setup¶

We are using a very simple Rancher setup, running as a container on an AWS EC2 instance. Documentation relating to its setup and configuration can be found in the following external (GoogleDoc) document: -

  1. Creating clusters with Rancher (AWS)

With the following relevant sections: -

  • Before you start * Create an S3 bucket for etcd backups * Create an AWS IAM User * Create an AWS IAM Role

  • Deploy Rancher (“quickstart”)

  • Set the Rancher server URL

  • Create Cloud Credentials

  • Create Node Templates

Creating clusters

  • Creating an EC2 cluster
  • Creating an EKS cluster
